name: Deep Panda, Shell Crew, WebMasters, KungFu Kittens, PinkPanther, Black Vine, APT 19, Codoso, Sunshop Group, TG-3551, Bronze Firestone, Pupa, Operation “Kingslayer”, C0d0so0
description:
Heatmap of (sub)techniques for Deep Panda, Shell Crew, WebMasters, KungFu Kittens, PinkPanther, Black Vine, APT 19, Codoso, Sunshop Group, TG-3551, Bronze Firestone, Pupa, Operation “Kingslayer”, C0d0so0. Source datasets can be found here: https://github.com/tropChaud/Categorized-Adversary-TTPs
